short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveals hidden passwords by pressing one of the Ctrl, Shift, or Alt keys along with a right-click on the password field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover your passwords with ease! This extension instantly reveals hidden passwords by pressing one of the Ctrl, Shift, or Alt keys along with a right-click on the password field. No more typing errors!
